description: Table containing Secure Chat conversation level items.

columns.name: CONVERSATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the secure chat conversation record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: LST_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the newest message in the conversation was sent.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient linked to the conversation.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the record was last locked/unlocked

columns.name: CONVERSATION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of the conversation record, which indicates the intended audience of the Secure Chat conversation. A null value indicates the conversation is only between staff members.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Staff-only conversation


Bedside conversation

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the patient encounter associated with this conversation. This item will only be populated for Bedside patient-facing conversations. A value here means the conversation may include a patient or their proxies.

columns.name: PAT_CONVERSATION_THREAD_ID
columns.description: The ID of the MyChart conversation linked to this Secure Chat conversation.

columns.name: CHAT_CONTEXT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the Secure Chat conversation context. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Alert

columns.name: LINKED_PUSH_NOTIF_ID
columns.description: Linked PNN (push notification) record ID to the TLK record that provides additional context about the conversation.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_GROUP_ID
columns.description: Stores TGR ID of the original group that received a Secure Chat. Used for starting and continuing conversations with additional context with this group.
